author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of the National Women’s Front staging a demonstration in Tiruchi on Wednesday. — PHOTO: M. SRINATH

Members of the National Women’s Front (NWF) staged a demonstration here on Wednesday demanding the withdrawal of cases booked against Jawaharlal Nehru University Student Union President Kanhaiya Kumar and other students of the same university in New Delhi recently.

The demonstration held at Chinthamani was led by the organisation’s district president A. Masooda Maryam.

The NWF members shouted slogans in support of their demand and condemned the Centre for letting loose “repressive measures” against students across the country.
title: Women’s Front demands withdrawal of case against JNU student leader
